roleset.name: to ride a bicycle
roleset.note: CYCLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cycle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from cycle.01-v predicate notes)
CYCLING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, cycle-v.01. corresponds to VNcls vehicle-51.4.1-1. (from cycling.01-n)

example.name: with direction
example.text: [A man]-1 gunned down by a stray bullet while [*-1]cycling to work carries , after his death , the official stigma of `` counterrevolutionary , '' his wife says .

example.name: with GOL
example.text: he grew older and more mature, his parents relented and allowed him on the roads and even acquiesced to his cycling to school some two kilometers away.
example.arg: to school so two kilometers away

roleset.name: to go through a cycle
roleset.note: CYCLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cycle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from cycle.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: Args1, 3, 4
example.text: Next came a 104 degree, 95% humidity 48-hour damp heat test, and then a "four corner" test where the machine cycled between 23 and 113 degrees Fahrenheit, both at its highest and lowest operating voltage.
example.arg: both at its highest and lowest operating voltage
